attributes.action: call siesta time in the afternoons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyafternoon just drags, workers are unenthused and creates bad morale.

Latin countries have the right idea, spend the afternoon wisely with a siesta.

We lobby for such a working change to come into force.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
